name: Lava Island Escape
description:
Dear Charles, 

We recently found an island which we request you to explore. This island is home to a precious artifact a mythical golden Llama. This idol was worshiped by the ancient civilization of the Aquix they were once a greedy people that craved gold. However, the Llama god became angered by their greed and cursed the Aquix people. It is told that their gold was scattered, and the people were turned into monsters. Find and bring that Llama idol for further studies. 

- Your Employers at, 

Every Voyage Is Lucky

Get Charles to the boat before the ash kills him. Watch for spikes or dead ends and don't dilly dally. Even though the coin's might be tempting.
